name: Standing Light Punch
miscellaneous: 3 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

name: Standing Heavy Kick
miscellaneous:
Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponentForces a juggle state when the attack lands as a Punish Counter.
Feet are Invincible from frame 8 to frame 15.

name: Crouching Light Punch
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Light Kick
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Heavy Punch
miscellaneous: Forces the opponent into a standing positionThis move can be canceled until the 1st active frame.

name: Crouching Heavy Kick
miscellaneous: Knockdown time extended when attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

name: Jumping Light Kick
miscellaneous: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Medium Punch
miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Jumping Medium Kick
miscellaneous: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Heavy Punch
miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown on counter or Punish Counter when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Rawhide
miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Outlaw Kick
miscellaneous: 19 frames of advantage added when the attack lands as a Punish Counter.Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Double Impact(1)
miscellaneous: 4 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

name: Fatal Shot
miscellaneous: Consumes 10000 of the Drive gauge on activation.

name: L Flash Knuckle
miscellaneous: Hold the button for more than 18 frames to change propertiesPerform the Perfect version by releasing the button between frames 18 - 20

name: L Flash Knuckle(Charged)
miscellaneous: Has a clash hitbox from frame 28 to frame 29.Combo scaling added to 2nd hit.

name: L Flash Knuckle(Perfect)
miscellaneous: Has a clash hitbox from frame 28 to frame 29.Combo scaling added to 2nd hit.

name: M Flash Knuckle
miscellaneous: Hold the button for more than 18 frames to change propertiesPerform the Perfect version by releasing the button between frames 18 - 20

name: M Flash Knuckle(Charged)
miscellaneous: Has a clash hitbox from frame 32 to frame 33.Combo scaling added to 2nd hit.

name: M Flash Knuckle(Perfect)
miscellaneous: Has a clash hitbox from frame 31 to frame 32.Combo scaling added to 2nd hit.

name: H Flash Knuckle
miscellaneous: Hold the button for more than 18 frames to change propertiesPerform the Perfect version by releasing the button between frames 18 - 20

name: H Flash Knuckle(Charged)
miscellaneous: Has a clash hitbox from frame 35 to frame 36.

name: H Flash Knuckle(Perfect)
miscellaneous: Has a clash hitbox from frame 35 to frame 36.

name: OD Flash Knuckle
miscellaneous: Transitions to 2nd attack on hitCan only be canceled into DDT on the 1st hit

name: DDT
miscellaneous: Consumes 10000 of the Drive gauge on activation.

name: Avenger
miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 13 - 31

name: OD Avenger
miscellaneous: Super Armor for 1 attack from frames 3 - 35Can transition to branching attacks from frames 12 - 31

name: Impaler
miscellaneous: 5 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

name: L Rising Uppercut
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 14Considered airborne from frames 8 - 36
*Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on

name: M Rising Uppercut
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 8Considered airborne from frames 9 - 39
*Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on

name: H Rising Uppercut
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 9Considered airborne from frames 11 - 43
Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on

name: OD Rising Uppercut
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 10Considered airborne from frames 8 - 50
Can only transition to Slam Dunk on hit

name: Slam Dunk
miscellaneous: Consumes 10000 of the Drive gauge on activation.

name: SA1 Vulcan Blast
miscellaneous:
Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 6Minimum guaranteed damage is 30%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter

name: SA2 Eraser
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 7Transitions to full attack after the 2nd hit
Minimum guaranteed damage is 40%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter

name: SA3 Pale Rider
miscellaneous:
Start up and invincibility changes depending on the distance from the opponent
When activated from close range
Start up is 10 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 13

When activated from furthest possible range
Start up is 27 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 30

Minimum guaranteed damage is 50%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
*Can only be canceled into from special moves

name: CA Pale Rider
miscellaneous:
Start up and invincibility changes depending on the distance from the opponent
When activated from close range
Start up is 10 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 13

When activated from furthest possible range
Start up is 27 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 30

Minimum guaranteed damage is 50%
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
*Can only be canceled into from special moves

name: Sweeper
miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Scrapper
miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Backward Dash
miscellaneous: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

name: Drive Impact: Muzzle Flash
miscellaneous:
Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit:
- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground
- Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

note: (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry)
name: Drive Reversal: Battering Ram
miscellaneous:
Recoverable damageCompletely invincible from frames 1 - 22
5 frames of recovery added on hit

name: Drive Parry
miscellaneous:
Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive RushParry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held
Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period
Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

name: Perfect Parry (strike)
miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameFully invincible for 6 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Perfect Parry (projectile)
miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameNo screen freeze occurs.
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Parry Drive Rush
miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 10th frameCan be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

name: Cancel Drive Rush
miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 9th frameCan be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
